title: path.Dir and filepath.Dir don't seem to work with Windows paths
body:
Bug reproduction examples:
http://play.golang.org/p/2vJu8wTbr3

```
fmt.Println(path.Dir(`D:\MyDocuments\3799\Defected House - 8.1.3+.zip`))
fmt.Println(filepath.Dir(`D:\MyDocuments\3799\Defected House.zip`))
```

Both return `.` as the directory.  Can it be because I cross compiled my binary?
